trans-unit.source: To start, set up your development environment by installing the Azure SDK for .NET.
trans-unit.target: To start, set up your development environment by installing the Azure SDK for .NET.

trans-unit.source: To install the SDK, click the link below.
trans-unit.target: To install the SDK, click the link below.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have Visual Studio installed, Visual Studio Express for Web will be installed along with the SDK.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have Visual Studio installed, Visual Studio Express for Web will be installed along with the SDK.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** Depending on how many of the SDK dependencies you already have on your machine, installing the SDK could take a long time, from several minutes to a half hour or more.
trans-unit.target: **Note:** Depending on how many of the SDK dependencies you already have on your machine, installing the SDK could take a long time, from several minutes to a half hour or more.

trans-unit.source: When you are prompted to run or save the installation executable, click **Run**.
trans-unit.target: When you are prompted to run or save the installation executable, click **Run**.

trans-unit.source: In the Web Platform Installer window, click **Install** and proceed with the installation.
trans-unit.target: In the Web Platform Installer window, click **Install** and proceed with the installation.

trans-unit.source: Web Platform Installer - Azure SDK for .NET
trans-unit.target: Web Platform Installer - Azure SDK for .NET

trans-unit.source: When the installation is complete, you have everything necessary to start developing.
trans-unit.target: When the installation is complete, you have everything necessary to start developing.
